errors.system_user_not_found: System user with ID {systemUserId} not found
errors.permission_not_assigned: Permission {permissionId} is not assigned to user {systemUserId}
errors.role_name_in_use: Role name "{name}" is already in use
errors.role_protected: This role is protected by the system and cannot be changed.
errors.superadmin_role_protected: Superadmin role cannot be deleted as it contains protected system user permissions.
errors.role_has_users: Cannot delete role because it is associated with one or more users. Please reassign users to different roles before deleting.
errors.permission_ids_not_exist: One or more permission IDs do not exist
errors.cannot_change_superadmin_permissions: Cannot change permissions for superadmin users.
errors.cannot_modify_protected_users: Cannot modify permissions for protected users with superadmin role
